channel.title: Comments on: U.S. Federal Budget Deficits

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2013/08/19/u-s-federal-budget-deficits/#comment-4094">Vasco de Sousa</a>.
True, although you'll note that we got back to large surpluses right after WWI ( 1920 ).
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Vasco de Sousa.

True, although you’ll note that we got back to large surpluses right after WWI ( 1920 ).

item.title: By: Vasco de Sousa
item.dc:creator: Vasco de Sousa
item.description: The big spending tends to be during war time, and sometimes paying back for the war afterwards.
item.content:encoded: The big spending tends to be during war time, and sometimes paying back for the war afterwards.
